elements.description: Defines a range slider instance element.
Defines the track of the slider.
Defines the fill of the slider.
Defines a handle of the slider.
Defines an element to display a Handle's value.

settings.description: Defines the minimum value of the range.
Defines the maximum value of the range.
Defines the step of the values.
Defines the start value of a handle.
Defines if the Handles' value display should be formatted.
Defines when should the <input> elements be updated.

options.description: The value of the range slider <input> will be updated on every single move of the handle. As the user moves the handle, the <input> constantly updates.
The value of the range slider <input> will be updated when the user releases the mouse/finger from the handle.
